data.description_html:
This spell functions like lesser planar binding, except that you can call a single creature of CR 14 or less.
XP Cost: 300 XP.
data.name: Truename Binding, Greater
data.spell_range: Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels); see lesser planar binding text
data.spell_resistance: No and yes; see lesser planar binding text
data.target: One elemental or outsider of CR 14 or less
